title: Add email and Instagram contact links to site footer

requirements.summary: Add clearly labeled email (mailto) and Instagram contact links to the public site footer without altering existing footer content.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays a clearly labeled email contact link that uses a mailto: URL for viraajdudeja12@gmail.com.
The footer displays a clearly labeled Instagram link that uses exactly: https://www.instagram.com/harmonyincense.in?igsh=bnR4a3FhYzFidXJy&utm_source=qr
The Instagram link opens in a new tab/window and uses rel="noopener noreferrer".
All user-facing labels for these links are in English.
Existing footer content (copyright, caffeine.ai attribution) remains present and functional.

file_operations.description: Update the footer JSX to include two additional public contact links: (1) an Email link labeled in English (e.g., "Email") using mailto:viraajdudeja12@gmail.com, and (2) an Instagram link labeled in English (e.g., "Instagram") using exactly https://www.instagram.com/harmonyincense.in?igsh=bnR4a3FhYzFidXJy&utm_source=qr with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer". Ensure the existing copyright text and the caffeine.ai attribution link remain present and continue to work.
